content: Any servers available that support the $document or $summary operation that we could use with our Inferno tests as we make updates?

Right now, I think @Peter Jordan may be working, see details here: , IPS confluence page here https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=120750114
I think it's also logged in here http://conman.clinfhir.com/connectathon.html?event=con28
Yes. I just updated this on the Confluence page. Let me know if there is anything else that I need to add there.
